attributes.action: change the name of "Silvertown" in East London to "New Guinea Lascarton"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The suggestion that Sivertown be re-named "Banglatown" has generated much interest, often of a quite toxic and discriminating nature.  Might one, with the greatest of respect to all toxic parties, suggest - and as it is Liverpool's Year of Culture and one which celebrates all port-side culture - that "New Guinea Lascarton" might just strike a note with all contenders - and justly allow London in 2012 to demonstrate its ability to embrace foreigners?
